description: Binding utilities used for MPI, OpenMP and GPUs. A script to set the process mask, OMP environment variables and CUDA environment variables to sane values if possible. Uses hwloc and nvidia-smi if available. Will preserve the current process binding, so it is safe to use with a queuing system or mpiexec.
name: kokkos/hpcbind
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
